description: Try our easy to follow Shepherd's Pie with Sweet Potato recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Shepherd's & cottage pie,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Sweet potato,Mince,Peanut free
name: Shepherd's Pie with Sweet Potato Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a frying pan over high heat. Brown mince, breaking it up with a spoon, for 5 minutes or until golden. Add sauce and carrot and bring to the boil. Reduce heat and simmer, covered, for 20 minutes. Add beans.
Meanwhile, steam or boil sweet potato for 1520 minutes or until very tender. Drain. Mash in butter with a potato masher until smooth. Add parmesan and stir to combine.
Spoon mince mixture into 4 ramekin dishes. Top with mash. Place on a tray and bake in the oven for 20 minutes or until potato browns. Serve with beans.
